articles.title: Older date for Ethiopian fossils sheds light on rise of Homo sapiens - AsiaOne

articles.title: Hockey P.E.I. repeals suspension for junior player who criticized handling of racist incident - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Hockey P.E.I. says it is repealing the indefinite suspension it gave to Keegan Mitchell, the junior hockey player who spoke out on social media after an opponent used an anti-Asian slur against one of his teammates in a game.

articles.title: About 70 South Korean attendees of Las Vegas CES tech trade show test positive for COVID-19 - CNA
articles.description:
SEOUL: About 70 South Korean nationals who attended the giant CES tech trade show in Las Vegas last week tested positive for COVID-19, health authorities of the Asian country said on Wednesday (Jan 12).
